title: Roasted autumn vegetable soup
ingredients: ['300g pumpkin, seeded and roughly chopped', '2 carrots, roughly chopped', '1 parsnip, roughly chopped', '1 leek, roughly chopped', '1 large onion, quartered', '125ml olive oil', 'few sprigs thyme', 'few sprigs rosemary', '3 bay leaves', '1.25L vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper', '120ml single cream']
